text: Claudia Grace Wells (born July 5, 1966) is an American actress and businesswoman, best known for her role as Jennifer Parker in the 1985 film Back to the Future. After her mother was diagnosed with breast cancer, Wells put her career on hold for family reasons and, as a result, didn't reprise her role as Jennifer Parker in Back to the Future Part II and Back to the Future Part III. Because of this Elisabeth Shue took over the role. ==Other websites== * Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from San Francisco Category:Actors from San Francisco
title: Claudia Wells
